statements: SELECT * FROM factories ORDER BY factory_name ASC;
SELECT factory_name, location FROM factories WHERE carbon_emissions > 100;
SELECT * FROM factories WHERE carbon_emissions < 50 ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT factory_id, factory_name FROM factories WHERE location LIKE '%York%';
SELECT factory_name, carbon_emissions FROM factories WHERE carbon_emissions BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY carbon_emissions DESC;
SELECT * FROM factories WHERE carbon_emissions > 1000 ORDER BY factory_name DESC;
SELECT factory_name, location FROM factories WHERE location LIKE 'New%' ORDER BY factory_id ASC;
SELECT factory_id, factory_name, carbon_emissions FROM factories WHERE carbon_emissions < 500 ORDER BY carbon_emissions DESC, factory_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM factories WHERE location IN ('New York', 'California', 'Texas') ORDER BY factory_id ASC;
SELECT factory_name, SUM(carbon_emissions) AS total_emissions FROM factories GROUP BY factory_name HAVING total_emissions > 5000 ORDER BY total_emissions DESC;
SELECT factory_name, location FROM factories;
SELECT factory_id, factory_name, carbon_emissions FROM factories WHERE carbon_emissions > 100;
SELECT * FROM emissions WHERE emission_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT factory_name, amount FROM factories JOIN emissions ON factories.factory_id = emissions.factory_id;
SELECT factory_name, SUM(amount) AS total_emissions FROM factories JOIN emissions ON factories.factory_id = emissions.factory_id GROUP BY factory_name;
SELECT * FROM factories WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT factory_name, carbon_emissions FROM factories WHERE carbon_emissions > 5000 ORDER BY carbon_emissions DESC;
SELECT factory_id, factory_name, location, carbon_emissions FROM factories JOIN emissions ON factories.factory_id = emissions.factory_id WHERE emission_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT factory_name, SUM(amount) AS total_emissions FROM factories JOIN emissions ON factories.factory_id = emissions.factory_id GROUP BY factory_name HAVING total_emissions > 10000;
SELECT f.factory_name, e.emission_date, e.amount FROM factories f JOIN emissions e ON f.factory_id = e.factory_id WHERE f.location = 'California' ORDER BY e.emission_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM factory;
SELECT id, name, location FROM factory ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT name, carbon_emissions FROM factory WHERE carbon_emissions > 1000;
SELECT manufacturer.name, emission_report.emissions FROM manufacturer JOIN emission_report ON manufacturer.id = emission_report.factory_id;
SELECT factory.name, emission_report.report_date FROM factory JOIN emission_report ON factory.id = emission_report.factory_id ORDER BY emission_report.report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM factory WHERE carbon_emissions > 1000 ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT name, location FROM factory WHERE location='USA' AND carbon_emissions < 500
SELECT manufacturer.name, factory.name FROM manufacturer INNER JOIN factory ON manufacturer.id = factory.id
SELECT factory.name, emission_report.report_date FROM factory LEFT JOIN emission_report ON factory.id = emission_report.factory_id

SELECT factory.name, SUM(emission_report.emissions) AS total_emissions FROM factory INNER JOIN emission_report ON factory.id = emission_report.factory_id GROUP BY factory.name HAVING total_emissions > 5000
SELECT * FROM factories;
SELECT factory_name, location FROM factories ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM emissions_report WHERE emissions_amount > 1000;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, job_title FROM employees WHERE hire_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT region_name FROM regions WHERE region_code = 'US';
SELECT * FROM factories;
SELECT factory_name, location FROM factories WHERE carbon_emissions > 1000;
SELECT * FROM emissions_report ORDER BY emissions_amount DESC;
SELECT factory_id, AVG(emissions_amount) AS avg_emissions FROM emissions_report GROUP BY factory_id;
SELECT e.employee_name, f.factory_name, r.region_name FROM employees e JOIN factories f ON e.factory_id = f.factory_id JOIN regions r ON f.location = r.region_name;
SELECT * FROM factories;
SELECT factory_id, factory_name FROM factories ORDER BY factory_id DESC;
SELECT factory_name, location FROM factories WHERE carbon_emissions > 1000;
SELECT factory_name, location, carbon_emissions FROM factories WHERE location LIKE 'New%';
SELECT * FROM emissions_records WHERE emission_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT * FROM factories ORDER BY factory_id DESC;
SELECT factory_name, location FROM factories WHERE carbon_emissions > 1000;

SELECT factories.factory_id, emissions_records.emission_amount, reports.report_date FROM factories JOIN emissions_records ON factories.factory_id = emissions_records.factory_id JOIN reports ON emissions_records.emission_id = reports.emission_id WHERE reports.region_id = 1;

SELECT factory_name, SUM(emission_amount) AS total_emissions FROM factories JOIN emissions_records ON factories.factory_id = emissions_records.factory_id GROUP BY factory_name HAVING total_emissions > 5000 ORDER BY total_emissions DESC;

SELECT users.username, factories.factory_name, regions.region_name FROM users JOIN reports ON users.user_id = reports.report_id JOIN factories ON reports.emission_id = factories.factory_id JOIN regions ON reports.region_id = regions.region_id;
